function.name: formatxml
function.description: Prettifies the formatting and indentation of the xml variable or string.

example.description: Suppose you have a string xml containing the following badly formatted XML:

examples.example: <note> <to>Tove</to> <from>Jani</from> <heading>Reminder</heading> <comment>Comments are welcome.</comment> <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body> </note>
